summary: This is an email from December 3, 2019, flagging a news article about a new lawsuit accusing Jeffrey Epstein of sexually abusing nine more women. The email mentions that Jordan Merson, likely an attorney, has not been on the sender's radar previously.

persons.name: Jordan Merson
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who has not been on the sender's radar, likely in connection with a new lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of a news article about a new lawsuit accusing him of sexually abusing nine more women.

connections.description: Jordan Merson is likely an attorney involved in a lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein, representing victims.

events.title: New Lawsuit Filed Against Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: A new lawsuit was filed against Jeffrey Epstein on or around December 3, 2019, accusing him of sexually abusing nine more women.
The email flags that Jordan Merson, likely an attorney, was not previously on the sender's radar.
The correspondence references a New York Post article covering the lawsuit.
